entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 10:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
